name: Explosive Chemistry
description:
You are a chemist who decided to make the elixir of the long  life, but for this you need to get the ingredients in different rooms,  in each room the game will give you a hint of the right object to be taken, but the difficulty will increase throughout the game.

I am Ar_Tombado (anonymous name), I started programming at 8 years old, and I fell in love with programming since then, especially in python. I learned to create godot games in setmind, where I made this game. Hope you like it!
